name: Tomato Basil Pasta
author: ANGELA DAWN
summary: This recipe is a simple, flavorful dish served at room temperature. Fantastic! This dish will refrigerate well and is just as yummy the next day for lunch as a cold pasta salad!
ingredients: 3 tablespoons grated Parmesan cheese, or to taste
salt and ground black pepper to taste
directions: Stir tomatoes, onion, olive oil, garlic, and basil together in a bowl
Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil
Cook fusilli in the boiling water, stirring occasionally, until cooked through but firm to the bite, 12 minutes
Toss warm pasta with feta cheese and Parmesan cheese in a large bowl
Stir tomato mixture into pasta and season with salt and pepper
